meaningMnemonic: If you have an <kanji>idea</kanji> of what you <kanji>want</kanji> already, then that's good! You have <vocabulary>will</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>desire</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>ambition</vocabulary>. Those who don't know what they want can't have any of these.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
